import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { Links } from "../utils/constants"; import { CartItem } from "../redux/types"; import MenuItem from "./MenuItem"; import { RootState } from "../redux/store"; const NavMenuTop = () => { const [open, setOpened] = useState(false); const cartItems = useSelector((state: RootState) => state.cart.cart); return (
setOpened(!open)} className="hamburger" title="Развернуть меню" > 8-044-734-56-78
    {Links.map((link) => ( setOpened(false)} /> ))}
{cartItems.length > 0 ? ( {cartItems.reduce( (sum: number, item: CartItem) => sum + item.quantity, 0 )}{" "} шт. /{" "} {cartItems.reduce( (sum: number, item: CartItem) => sum + item.price * item.quantity, 0 )}{" "} byn ) : ( 0 шт. / 0 byn )}
); }; export default NavMenuTop;
